name: Carl Johan Schönherr
obverse: Head of Carl Johan Schönherr facing left.
reverse: Three books on a table. The top book is Schönherr's most famous work Genera et species curculionidum.
reverse_inscriptions: ENTOMOLOGO PER CELEBRI SOCIO MUNIF.R. AC. SC. SVEC. MDCCCLIII
description: This jeton commemorates the Swedish entomologist (specifically coleopterist) Carl Johan Schönherr. Schönherr revised the taxonomy of beetles, including weevils.
Schönherr was elected to the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences in 1809.
Lea Ahlborn may have designed this medal.
